title: MD
biography: Lotpot is an Indian bilingual comic magazine published by Mayapuri Group. Lotpot title was registered by P. K. Bajaj in 1969 and the first issue came out in the same year and has been published without a break since then.
aiSummary: P. K. Bajaj is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 51 at Diabetology (Member). Has been published in Applied Sciences, Smart Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
